column2: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - House of Cards (2015) #5
column6: EDDIE DEAN'S CHAPTER IN STEPHEN KING'S DARK FANTASY EPIC COMES TO A SHOCKING CONCLUSION! It's Eddie Dean versus the LOBSTROSITIES! Will he make it out alive? The Gunslinger comes face to face with the ghosts of his past! Plus: Who will be the next addition to the KA-TET?!
column8: | writer:Peter David | writer:Robin Furth | artist:Piotr Kowalski | penciller (cover):Julian Totino Tedesco
